Discover a luxurious beachfront paradise in an intimate, elegant world-class setting. The Hilton Bentley hotel offers a stellar walk-to-anything location in South Beach's 'Sofi', a refined and sophisticated enclave of Miami Beach. Guests are footsteps to Miami Beach's playground of the finest restaurants and nightlife, one mile away from Lincoln Road and the Miami Beach Convention Center, three miles away from the Port of Miami, and only seven miles from Miami International Airport. Relax in style in the amenity-rich suites of Hilton Bentley. Offering modern elegance, each of our studio, one-bedroom, two-bedroom and penthouse suites have been designed to exquisite detail. Enjoy contemporary European furnishings, Italian marble floors,50-inch LCD TVs, and stainless steel gourmet kitchens and kitchenettes. Experience the majestic views of the Atlantic Ocean and Miami Beach.Hilton

name: Staybridge Suites Miami International Airport
description: Staybridge Suites - Miami International Airport features air-conditioned rooms in Miami. With an outdoor swimming pool, the property also has a fitness center, as well as barbecue facilities. Miami International Airport is 1.2 mi from the property, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service. A continental breakfast is available daily at the hotel. All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a bath or shower and a hair dryer. All rooms feature a desk. An onsite bar and juice bar are provided for guests to enjoy. An evening reception with complimentary light fare, beer, and wine is offered Monday through Wednesday. Guests will find a 24-hour front desk, a business center and laundry service at the property. Complimentary shuttle service is offered to the Miami Intermodal Center, which is 1476 ft away. The property is 2.7 mi from Marlins Park and 3.7 mi from Miracle Mile Miami.

name: The Palms Hotel & Spa
description: This oceanfront hotel on Miami Beach has an outdoor pool in a tropical garden setting. Rooms feature Chromecast streaming. Select rooms have a separate seating areas. All rooms at the Palms Hotel & Spa have flat-screen TVs. Guests will find a work desk and ironing facilities, as well as BeeKind® toiletries. Views from the rooms include the hotel gardens, the cityscape or the Atlantic Ocean beaches. The on-site The Palms AVEDA Spa offers a variety of body care services. There’s Wi-Fi in the guest business center and throughout the hotel. Along with the pool, the hotel has a fitness center and is adjacent to the city pedestrian boardwalk. Guests can enjoy al fresco dining at Essensia Restaurant, which features sustainably-sourced ingredients prepared to showcase seasonal favorites. The hotel’s Tiki Bar provides poolside drinks. Guests can also use on-site beach amenities like lounge chairs and towels, along with food and beverage service. The Palms Hotel & Spa is one mile from the Julia Tuttle Causeway on Interstate 195. The Bayshore Municipal Golf Course is 2 miles from the hotel and Miami International Airport is 12 miles away.

name: Majestic Hotel South Beach, Trademark Collection by Wyndham
description: No description found

name: Sonesta Miami Airport
description: Just 2625 feet from Miami International Airport, Sonesta Miami Airport in Miami, Florida offers convenient services such as 24-hour airport shuttle service and Wi-Fi in all guest rooms. Sonesta Miami Airport features an outdoor pool. Guests can work out in the fitness center or be productive in the business center. Guests can enjoy their stay at this completely nonsmoking hotel. Cafe 950 at the Sonesta Miami Airport is open for breakfast, lunch. Guests can also enjoy the hotel's welcoming Buena Vista Lounge.

name: Wyndham Garden Miami International Airport
description: Located in Miami, 5.3 miles from Marlins Park, Wyndham Garden Miami International Airport provides accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness center and a shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, free shuttle service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. Guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Wyndham Garden Miami International Airport has certain rooms with city views, and each room comes with a coffee machine. At the accommodation every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Continental and American breakfast options are available daily at Wyndham Garden Miami International Airport. The hotel has a terrace. Guests can use the business center or relax in the bar. Adrienne Arsht Center for the Performing Arts is 7.4 miles from Wyndham Garden Miami International Airport, while American Airlines Arena is 7.5 miles away. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, a few steps from the accommodation.

name: Kent Hotel
description: Located just 3 minutes' walk from the beach, Kent Hotel offers free beach towels and access to an on-site garden. Free WiFi is available. A flat-screen cable TV is available in each of Kent Hotel's modern rooms along with a DVD player and iPod docking station. A hairdryer and ironing facilities are also included. Meeting and banquet facilities are accessible at this boutique hotel. Laundry and dry-cleaning services are also offered, and Kent Hotel's multilingual staff provides full concierge services. On-site Rakija Lounge Bar & Grill serves sandwiches, salads, and seafood. A transfer service is available to Dolphin Mall via a local provider (at a cost, the service is not free Shopping and dining on Ocean Drive are just 2 minutes’ walk from Kent Hotel. Guests will be 11 miles from Miami International Airport.

name: Springhill Suites Miami Downtown/Medical Center
description: In the heart of downtown, our Miami pet-friendly hotel places you just minutes away from Wynwood/Design District, Port of Miami, LoanDepot Park and walking distance to the University of Miami Hospital. Jump-start your day with a complimentary hot breakfast and join us for a perfect stay in Miami while you immerse yourself in the local culture by exploring art galleries and diverse restaurants. Take advantage of our covered parking garage while you explore Miami or during your Caribbean escape. For those visiting one of the five main medical centers or hospitals in the area, our complimentary shuttle can both drop off and pick up often. After a busy day out in the city, unwind at our 13Eleven restaurant or enjoy spending time on our outdoor terrace. Keep up with your workout routine in the outdoor pool and fitness center. End your evening by stretching out in one of our stylish, spacious, ultra comfortable suites with complimentary WiFi, mini-fridge, microwave, and extended living area.Marriott

name: Smart Brickell Hotel
description: Located in Miami, 1.1 miles from Bayfront Park Station and 1.6 miles from Bayside Market Place, Smart Brickell Hotel provides accommodations with free WiFi, air conditioning, an outdoor swimming pool and a terrace. Private parking is available on site. The condo hotel offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hairdryer and shower. Some units include a dining area and/or a balcony. Bayfront Park is 1.6 miles from Smart Brickell Hotel, while American Airlines Arena is 1.8 miles away. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 6.2 miles from the accommodation.

name: Costa Norte Boutique Hotel
description: Located in Miami Beach and within a 4-minute walk of Miami Beach, Costa Norte Boutique Hotel has a terrace, allergy-free rooms, and free WiFi throughout the property. This 3-star hotel offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. Surfside Beach is 1.2 miles from the hotel and New World Center is 4.9 miles away. The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. Rooms have a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Costa Norte Boutique Hotel each room has bed linen and towels. Holocaust Memorial is 4.9 miles from the accommodation, while Miami Beach Convention Center is 4.9 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 12 miles from Costa Norte Boutique Hotel.

name: Element Miami Doral
description: A contemporary haven amid Miami's vibrant cityscape, Element Miami Doral enjoys a prime location near popular South Florida attractions. Stylish studios and suites offer fully-equipped kitchens, pillowtop mattresses, work desks, and much more. Our eco-friendly accommodations provide a tranquil retreat, conveniently situated near US Southern Command and Florida International University, and close to the airport. Start your day with a complimentary breakfast, setting the perfect tone for exploration and relaxation. Discover museums and indulge in shopping sprees at Dolphin Mall and International Mall. Miami's beaches beckon, inviting you to bask in the warm embrace of the ocean. Afterward, cool off with a dip in our outdoor pool. At 107 Steak & Bar, savor delectable cuts of prime beef and fusion cuisine. Elevate your events in versatile spaces, perfect for meetings, weddings, and private parties. Experience the best of Miami at Element Miami Doral, your home base for unforgettable adventures.Marriott

name: The Gabriel Miami Downtown, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Daily Mandatory Destination Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: Premium internet access: $25 food and beverage credit for use in all hotel outlets: shuttle transfer to the Gabriel South Beach, including beach access and two chairs. Experience the essence of downtown Miami, FL at The Gabriel, Curio Collection by Hilton. Our Biscayne Boulevard hotel puts you in the perfect spot for gorgeous bay views from any of our 85 guest room balconies and the 14th floor pool deck. Kaseya Center, Adrienne Arsht Center, Frost Science Museum, and the Perez Art Museum are less than a 10-minute walk away. The hotel is a short drive to South Beach, Brickell, and the Wynwood Arts and Design district. Conveniently located near Miami International Airport, Port Miami terminal, and public transit, we make getting around a breeze. We also provide valet parking. Sip a signature cocktail from Bella's Bar poolside or try unique cuisine from The Gabriel Restaurant, open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The sophisticated third-floor Library Lounge features refreshments and vibrant books about music, art, film, and culture. Burn calories while gazing out at Biscayne Bay from our 24-hour, state-of-the-art fitness facility. We also offer complimentary poolside yoga classes every weekend. All of our guest rooms and suites are spacious and have views through floor-to-ceiling windows and smart tech, including integrated digital media with high-definition sound, internet, and a safe with laptop charging.Hilton

name: Bikini Hostel, Cafe & Beer Garden
description: This South Beach hostel is centrally located 10 minutes’ walk from the beach and Lincoln Road District mall, restaurants, and bars. Features include Free Breakfast, Free Dinner and free WiFi. The 24-hour Bikini Hostel reception can arrange multilingual guided activities and entrance to night clubs for a fee. The Cafe and Beer Garden serves dinner. A shared kitchen is on site as well. The hostel is also 5 mi from Miami city center, Bayfront Park, and American Airlines Arena.

name: Biltmore Hotel
description: Boasting amenities including an 18-hole golf course and a full-service spa, this historic resort in Coral Gables, Florida is just 4 miles from Miami International Airport. Brickell City Center is 6.2 mi away. University of Miami is 1.6 miles away Robes and linens are offered in each room at the Biltmore Hotel. A 65-inch flat-screen TV and telephone are also included. The Biltmore Hotel offers 10 lighted tennis courts, an outdoor 2300 square yard swimming pool with cabanas, and an on-site fitness center. In addition, the hotel offers over 150 acres of lush tropical landscape and spacious meeting and banquet facilities. Guests staying at the Biltmore can enjoy a variety of gourmet dining options, including contemporary French cuisine at Palme d'Or and classic Italian dishes at Fontana. The hotel also offers classic pub fare at the 19th Hole restaurant and a Sunday Champagne Brunch. Shopping and dining at Village of Merrick Park are just 1.8 miles from this hotel. Guests will be 5.1 miles from Vizcaya Museum and Gardens, and 3.3 miles from coconut Grove.

name: Acqualina Resort & Residences On The Beach
address: 17875 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: Reminiscent of a Mediterranean villa, Acqualina invites you to step into a world of luxury with unprecedented accommodations and service, world-class dining destinations with four restaurants including the new Avra Miami and Il Mulino New York, three oceanfront swimming pools, Acqualina Spa, spacious meeting rooms, and AcquaMarine, an innovative marine biology-based children's program. Recent introductions to the resort include a new Adult Pool experience and a Floridian-meets-Mediterranean menu at the beachside Costa Grill. The luxury seaside haven is located on 4.5 beachfront acres in Miami’s Sunny Isles Beach, and conveniently located between Miami International Airport and Fort Lauderdale Airport. Designed to offer a sense of modern luxury with classic furnishings and finishes, the richly appointed accommodations are the hallmark of the guest experience at Acqualina. Offerings include 54 guest rooms and 44 suites, all offering expansive floor plans and breathtaking views from private balconies. One, Two and Three Bedroom Oceanfront Suites are available. Only 10 minute drive from the Acqualina Resort are the luxury shops and restaurants of Bal Harbor. The vibrant South Beach area as well as the legendary Art Deco district is also within driving distance. A family owned and operated property, Acqualina is a recipient of the coveted Forbes Travel Guide Five-Star Award for both the hotel and spa, as well as the AAA Five Diamond Award. Acqualina is also named the #1 Best Resort in the U.S. and the #1 Best Hotel in the U.S. by U.S. News & World Report.USA Today named Acqualina Best Destination Resort in the U.S.

name: Hotel Croydon
description: Hotel Croydon Mid Beach is situated in Miami Beach and is close to the area's popular attractions. It also provides a rooftop terrace, free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool. The hotel has a gym with a swimming pool. Facilities include facial and body treatments, plus an executive floor and an express check-in and check-out feature. Hotel Croydon Mid Beach provides air conditioned rooms with luxury toiletries, a mini bar and an iPod docking station. They each offer an in-room safe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Those in search of a meal and wanting to stay close by needn't look any further than the hotel's in-house restaurant, which is ideally available each day for lunch and dinner. In the evening, guests are welcome to wind down in the lounge bar. Hotel Croydon Mid Beach is within a short walk of The Forge. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Miami Beach.Revato

name: Hilton Aventura Miami
description: Our beautiful AAA 4-Diamond hotel is conveniently located across from Aventura Mall and a short drive away from Fort Lauderdale/Hollywood and Miami International Airports, Hard Rock Stadium, Gulfstream Park, Aventura Hospital, and Sunny Isles Beach. A complimentary shuttle is available within a five-mile radius. Indulge in culinary delights at Gala, offering South American-inspired cuisine, and enjoy specially crafted cocktails at MuseBar. We offer two amenity decks and poolside cabanas. Shuttle Service to Aventura Mall, Gulfstream Park, and Sunny Isles Beach is now available from 10:00 am - 6:30 pm daily. Hilton Aventura Miami is the ideal setting for work or play.Hilton

name: SERENA Hotel Aventura Miami, Tapestry Collection by Hilton
description: The SERENA Hotel Aventura is moments away from world class shopping at Aventura Mall and neighbors to Gulf Stream Park and Casino, where you can enjoy live horse races, fine restaurants, gambling and shopping. We are located in the epicenter of the Aventura Medical District and the nearest hotel to the Aventura Hospital. Enjoy refined contemporary rooms and suites in a relaxed atmosphere. A portion of our suites feature separate living and sleeping areas featuring including a fully equipped kitchen. We offer a full restaurant and bar, a conference room, fitness center and rooftop swimming pool. SERENA is derived from the Latin word serenus, meaning clear, tranquil, or serene. Whether you’ve spent your day under the sun, shopping or working you can unplug and arrive at your place of tranquility.Hilton

name: The Mutiny Hotel
description: Offering a heated outdoor pool, the Mutiny Luxury Suites Hotel overlooks Sailboat Bay and is 1053 ft from the Coconut Grove shopping and dining district. Features include a restaurant, bar, and sauna. Kitchen and sofa bed are provided in all suites. Coconut Grove Mutiny Luxury Suites Hotel extras include 2 flat-screen TVs and a Bose® Bluetooth® docking station. Room service is offered for a fee. Free WiFi in public areas, a fitness center, and a hot tub in addition to a 24-hour front desk are available to guests throughout their stay. Massages and in-room dining are offered for a fee. Table 14 Bar & Restaurant is the product of JC & Cristina Digon’s vision and passion along with Executive Chef Nilton Castillo’s international cuisine. Table 14 features breakfast, lunch, dinner, and room service menus. Miami city center and the University of Miami are within 19 minutes’ drive away. The hotel is also 2 mi from Viscaya Museum & Gardens and 5.8 mi from the South Beach Art Deco District.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Miami Beach South Beach
description: Discover all you need to energize your Miami Beach adventure or slow to a leisurely pace at Courtyard Miami Beach South Beach. Positioned on vibrant Washington Ave. in the Art Deco District, our hotel immerses you in the heart of Miami Beach's iconic scene. Enjoy contemporary amenities featuring a delectable American eatery, convenient valet parking, complimentary Wi-Fi and a Starbucks® café. Our intimate event venue offers tailored dining choices and advanced AV tools perfect for executive meetings and special gatherings in Miami Beach. Refresh in our rooftop pool or stay fit in our 24/7 fitness center equipped with state-of-the-art cardio machines and free weights. As the day winds down, retire to your pet-friendly hotel suite with separate living and sleeping areas, compact fridges, premium bedding, well-appointed workspaces, flat-screen TVs and chic décor. Whether your visit is for business or leisure, craft a memorable stay at Courtyard Miami Beach South Beach.Marriott

name: Extended Stay America Premier Suites - Miami - Airport - Doral -25th Street
description: This Extended Stay America - Miami - Airport - Doral - 25th Street is located in Miami and especially designed for longer stays, with all rooms featuring a fully equipped kitchen. The hotel offers free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk. Every kitchen at Extended Stay America - Miami is equipped with a stovetop, microwave and a fridge. The hotel also provides guests with laundry and ironing facilities as well as upgraded bedding with extra pillows. Free grab-and-go breakfast including breakfast bars, muffins, hot cereal, coffee and tea is served every morning. Weekly housekeeping services are provided for free and daily provided for a fee. Towels and linen can be exchanged at the front desk. The property offers free onsite parking. An attraction within close proximity to the hotel is the Dolphin Mall.

name: Blue Moon Hotel
description: No description found

name: Sleep Inn Miami Airport
description: At the Sleep Inn Miami Airport hotel in Miami Springs, FL, youll dream better and feel well rested. Our affordable hotel is near Miami International Airport. Nearby destinations include Miami Airport Convention Center and University of Miami. Enjoy amenities that include free breakfast, free WiFi, free weekday newspaper, free coffee, an outdoor heated pool, sun deck, guest laundry, copy and fax. Each comfortable, modern guest room features a HDTV, hair dryer and microwave. Refrigerator rentals are available. Our hotel is accessible to individuals with disabilities. Also, earn rewards including free nights and gift cards with our Choice Privileges Rewards program.Choice Hotels

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Miami Doral West Airport
description: Find us less than two miles from MIA Airport – easily accessible with our free shuttle. Dolphin Mall and Miami International Mall can be reached in six minutes by car. Downtown and CityPlace Doral are both within a 10-minute drive. We’re only 1.5 miles to Jackson Memorial. Enjoy free WiFi and a heated outdoor pool at our pet friendly hotel. Breakfast is on us.Hilton

name: Esme Miami Beach
description: Esme Hotel has a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a bar and shared lounge in Miami Beach. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and room service. The air-conditioned rooms come with a desk and free WiFi. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a shower. All units have a wardrobe. Guests at Esme Hotel can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. Popular points of interest near Esme Hotel include New World Center, Versace Mansion and LIK Fine Art Miami. The nearest airport is Miami Seaplane Base Airport, 3.1 mi from the hotel.

name: Atwell Suites Miami Brickell, An IHG Hotel
description: Nestled in the chic Brickell neighborhood near Port of Miami, Atwell Suites Miami Brickell offers an unparalleled experience, close to beautiful beaches and top attractions. Discover trendy rooftop restaurants and bars. Shop upscale boutiques in Brickell City Centre. Enjoy live music at Bayside Marketplace on Biscayne Bay and soak up the sun at Miami's iconic South Beach. Visit the Perez Art Museum, explore the vibrant culture of Little Havana, or catch an exciting Miami Marlins game at LoanDepot Park. Balance work and play in our spacious pet-friendly suites with free Wi-Fi and standing desks. Collaborate in our shared workspaces and bookable meeting room. Satiate anytime cravings at our 24/7 Market and Beverage Station and enjoy our paid bar with cocktails and shareable small plates. For an authentic taste of Miami, dine at Mosaico Kitchen & Bar located in our shared space with Hotel Indigo. From free breakfast to rooftop pool and fitness studio, indulge in the perfect blend of comfort and convenience at Atwell Suites Miami Brickell, where your Miami adventure awaits!IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Provident Doral At The Blue
description: Provident Doral at the Blue features holiday villas and each one includes a full kitchen. Guests will enjoy access to a resort-style pool and the Miami International Airport is 15 minutes’ drive away. Free WiFi is available in each of these Miami villas along with flat-screen TVs. All units have a spa bath and some have a private balcony or an additional bathroom. Guests can visit the on-site fitness center at Provident Doral at the Blue Miami or schedule a massage at the spa and wellness center. A hot tub is also on site as well as a sauna. The Chophouse 5300 is an on-site restaurant at this resort and there is also the Poolside Bar and Grill open seasonally. This property is 16 mi from the shores of Miami Beach. The Lincoln Road Mall offers many shopping options and is 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Miami Beach
description: Find something delightfully different at AC Hotel Miami Beach, located on Collins Ave in the heart of sunny Miami Beach. Our hotel near Miami International Airport offers the perfect place to relax and soak up some Miami sunshine, with two beach chairs included in the hotel’s amenity fee. Explore the Miami Beach boardwalk within walking distance of our hotel, or wander through the boutique shops at nearby Lincoln Road Mall. Start your day with the European-inspired breakfast at our hotel restaurant, AC Kitchen, followed by Beach Yoga. At the end of the day, visit Gin & Collins for delicious tapas, signature cocktails and international wines. Our 24-hour fitness center helps you stay active with an assortment of free weights and cardio machines, while our rooftop pool boasts spectacular views of Miami Beach. Relax in your suite, featuring either floor-to-ceiling windows or a private balcony. You work hard, so play hard at AC Hotel Miami Beach.Marriott

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Miami West/FL Turnpike
description: Make the most out of your Miami-Doral visit. Whether you're in town for a meeting, project, and or just a family vacation, we are the ideal choice. Centrally located 15 minutes from Miami International Airport and within 10 minutes to Dolphin Mall and soon to come American Dream Mall, this hotel is tailor-made for extended-stay travelers. All 123 suites have all the comforts of a home, and include fully equipped kitchens, in-room wireless WIFI, and incredible beds to ensure you get a great night's sleep. Don't leave your four-legged friends behind - this is a pet-friendly hotel! Start your day with a complimentary hot (and delicious) breakfast, or head to the fitness center for a revitalizing workout. If you'd like to explore the area, this hotel places you near all major expressways that can take you to the airport, Doral, Downtown Miami and the beautiful beaches. This home-away-from-home hotel in Doral Florida is just what you were looking for so you can experience a stress-free stay.Marriott

name: Hotel Colonnade Coral Gables, Autograph Collection
description: Surround yourself with world class shopping, decadent dining and electrifying entertainment venues at Hotel Colonnade Coral Gables, Autograph Collection. Our luxury hotel flaunts an ideal location along Miracle Mile near the area's most popular destinations including University of Miami, Watsco Center, Marlins Park as well as Little Havana. Boasting vaulted ceilings, a grand staircase and sparkling chandeliers, our spectacular hotel lobby sets the scene for our stylishly designed accommodations. Unpack in spacious rooms and suites with wood floors, sectional sofas, modern decor and deluxe amenities before relaxing on a canopy bed with plush, pillow-top mattresses and luxurious linens. In your free time, maintain your wellness routine at our hotel's fitness center, play a round of billiards in our game room or soak up the sunshine next to our gorgeous rooftop pool. From our boutique accommodations to intuitive amenities, Hotel Colonnade Coral Gables, Autograph Collection will entice your sense of enjoyment.Marriott

name: Berkeley Shore Hotel
description: The Berkeley offers 96 rooms, gorgeous views, a rooftop pool and many other upscale enhancements. Were also committed to a mission of sustainability and have removed all plastics from our hotel as part of Iberostars Wave of Change initiative.Youll fall in love with the classic Art Deco faade and modern interiors of our South Beach hotel. Experience world-class amenities, impeccable service and spectacular views.iHotelier/iStay

name: SpringHill Suites by Marriott Miami Doral
description: No description found

name: Pestana Miami South Beach
description: Set in South Beach, Pestana South Beach Hotel is within an easy walk of Miami City Ballet and New World Center. It also provides free Wi-Fi, a swimming pool and an express check-in and check-out feature. This modern hotel offers babysitting/child services, a concierge and a 24-hour reception. Couples will enjoy the hotel's features like vip rooms and honeymoon suites. The rooms are air conditioned and include tea and coffee making facilities, a mini bar and an in-room safe. Bathrobes are also provided for extra comfort. Those in search of a meal and wanting to stay nearby needn't look any further than Pestana South Beach Hotel's in-house restaurant, which is ideally open each day for breakfast and lunch. Attractions near Pestana South Beach Hotel include Miami Beach Convention Center, the Holocaust Memorial of the Greater Miami Jewish Federation and Lincoln Road. The hotel's multilingual staff will make sure that every traveller has a comfortable stay.Revato

name: Aloft Coral Gables
address: 2524 South Le Jeune Road, Coral Gables, FL 33134
description: An easy breezy adventure awaits for you in South Florida at Aloft Coral Gables. Our downtown hotel is perfectly positioned to explore the boutique shops and fine-dining restaurants on the Miracle Mile, as well as take in the arts and entertainment of University of Miami in Coral Gables. Meet & mingle with friends at our W XYZ® bar, and grab healthy snacks and beverages from Re:fuel, our 24-hour pantry. Hang out in our ultra-modern lobby boasting a unique Spanish-inspired design, and discover our spacious rooms and suites with complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi for posting pics and videos to your social media. You can also spend time on your room's balcony or patio, and sip cocktails and savor fresh seafood at our in-house restaurant. After a day exploring Coral Gables, make your way to our pool for a refreshing dip. Busy business travelers can reserve our 600-square-foot meeting room for events. Get ready to experience an urban-inspired oasis in the heart of Florida at Aloft Coral Gables.Marriott

name: Dream South Beach
description: Welcoming guests with pets, this hotel is located in Miami Beach and features an infinity pool and a private beach. It also provides a coffee bar, valet parking and a rooftop terrace. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can assist with booking tours and tickets. After a long day exploring the area, Shala Spa provides an ideal place to relax with massage services. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a mini bar, cable/satellite channels and an iPod docking station. All provide an alarm clock, a flat-screen TV and a laptop safe. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal place to enjoy a meal. A wide selection of eating options can also be found in the area. Miami Beach's attractions, such as Ocean Drive and Miami Beach Architectural District, are easily accessible on foot from Dream South Beach. Located within a five-minute walk are the Wolfsonian-FIU and Lummus Park.Revato

name: The Balfour Hotel
description: Located in South Beach, Hotel Room Mate Lord Balfour is a perfect starting point from which to explore Miami Beach (FL). Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, taxi service, ticket service, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. Hotel Room Mate Lord Balfour combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Miami Beach (FL) unforgettable.Agoda

name: The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort
description: The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort welcomes you to savor an exceptional experience at our exquisitely appointed retreat in Miami Beach, FL. Rising 27 stories over fashionable Collins Ave and a brilliant white-sand beach, our luxury hotel resides at the intersection of art, fashion and design. Prestigious Forbes Five-Star and AAA Five-Diamond accolades set the stage for unparalleled service and amenities. Step into spacious guest rooms and suites with direct ocean views from expansive private balconies. Then, luxuriate in superb resort amenities including 14,000 square feet of indulgence at The Spa at St. Regis, Oceanfront Day Villas and gourmet dining options. An oasis of pampering and privilege at the northern tip of Miami Beach, FL, Bal Harbour is one of the most distinguished addresses in South Florida, and our hotel has long been a favorite destination for jet-setting travelers worldwide.Marriott

name: Selina Miami River
description: Situated in Miami, Selina Miami River provides modern 3-star accommodation, as well as an outdoor pool. It offers complimentary Wi-Fi, luggage storage and a designated smoking area. The hotel has a gym with a swimming pool. Additional services include 24-hour security. After a day of exploring the nearby area, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. Guests of Selina Miami River can relax at the on-site bar, ideally based for a drink. Miami's attractions, such as Miami-Dade County Courthouse, are within a 10-minute walk of the hotel. It is also perfectly located close to a variety of dining options.Revato

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami - Airport West
description: The Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami - Airport West hotel in Florida is located minutes from the Miami International Airport and Downtown Miami, close to numerous office buildings and industrial parks in the Doral area. The Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami - Airport West hotel is also within walking distance to several restaurants and offers complimentary shuttle service to the Miami International Airport. The Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami - Airport West hotel in Florida features 86 two-room suites and 34 studio suites. We also feature 4 very spacious two bedroom suites with 2 bathrooms. All suites have a fully-equipped kitchen with granite countertops and wood floors, full-size refrigerator, range, microwave oven, coffee maker, two phones with data ports, high-speed internet access, HBO, iron and ironing board and a hair dryer. The Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami Airport West Florida hotel has a first-class business center that is complimentary to guest and accessible 24 hours a day. Enjoy a complimentary Suite Start hot breakfast seven days a week, Welcome Home Reception featuring light meal and drinks every Wednesday evening, and a Suite Shop snacks and sundries are also available 24 hours at this Miami Florida hotel. Make Yourself At Home!Hilton

name: Lennox Miami Beach
description: Lennox Hotels Miami Beach in Miami Beach offers a private beach area and outdoor swimming pool. Well located in the South Beach district, this hotel features a fitness center. The accommodations offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service for guests. All units in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hair dryer. The units at Lennox Hotels Miami Beach are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The accommodations offers a sun terrace. Guests at Lennox Hotels Miami Beach will be able to enjoy activities in and around Miami Beach, like cycling. Miami Beach Convention Center is 0.7 mi from the hotel, while LIK Fine Art Miami is 0.7 mi away. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 12 mi from the property.

name: Bentley Hotel South Beach
description: Location This hotel enjoys an oceanfront location in the heart of South Beach and the Art Deco district. It is within walking distance of South Beach's famous shopping streets and just 3 minutes from Lincoln Road Mall. Everything South Beach has to offer is at the doorstep: trendy restaurants, designer boutiques, non-stop nightlife and, of course, the beach. The accommodation is only 7 minutes from downtown Miami, 10 minutes from Brickell Avenue, 15 minutes from Coconut Grove and 20 minutes from Key Biscayne. Miami International Airport is 15 minutes away. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 39 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby area, where a 24-hour check-out service is available. A lift provides easy access to the upper floors. Amenities include a safe. Internet access is available in public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a café and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. Guests travelling in their own vehicles can make use of the available parking spaces. Additional services include room service and a laundry. In addition, a conference room and a business centre are also available. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, central heating, a fan, a kitchen and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. Most rooms additionally feature a balcony or a terrace. Each accommodation unit features separate bedrooms, a queen-size bed or a sofa-bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. For self-catering guests, there is a well equipped kitchenette with a fridge, a mini-fridge, a microwave and tea and coffee making equipment. An ironing set is also available to guests. Each accommodation unit offers internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio, a stereo system and wireless internet access. Wheelchair-accessible accommodation units are also bookable. Each of the bathrooms features a shower, a hairdryer and bathrobes. Sports/Entertainment The swimming pool is ideal for a refreshing dip. Sun loungers and parasols offer the ideal way to unwind. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. The poolside bar serves a selection of refreshing drinks. Leisure options at the establishment also include a gym, a spa, a steam bath and massage treatments. A wellness area with a solarium is available. Meals The establishment offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Payment All major credit cards, including American Express, VISA and MasterCard, are accepted for payment.WebBeds

name: Carillon Miami Wellness Resort
description: Located on 750 feet of private beach along the Atlantic Ocean, Carillon Miami Beach is located in Miami Beach, Florida. Spa services from neuromuscular therapy to body rituals, skin care treatments, and pedicures as well as a salon are offered. Bathrobes and slippers add comfort to each suite. A flat-screen TV, free WiFi, and a fully equipped kitchenette with granite counters are featured. The bathroom is spa-inspired, tiled with Italian glass and stone flooring. Boasting 4 pools and 4 hot tubs, Carillon also has over 40 fitness classes available each day. A cycling and walking trail surrounds the property, and a rock-climbing wall is featured on site. The Strand Bar and Grill restaurant features seasonal cuisine, ocean views, and floor-to-ceiling windows as well as an outdoor patio. The Cabana services light fare with cocktails, and The Corner Store serves juice. Premium shopping at the Lincoln Road Mall is 4.8 mi away, and the La Gorce Golf Course is 6 minutes' drive from the hotel. Within 20 minutes' drive of the hotel are Jungle Island, the Art Deco District, and the Greater Miami Convention and Visitors Bureau.

name: DoubleTree Resort & Spa by Hilton Ocean Point-N. Miami Beach
address: 17375 Collins Avenue, North Miami Beach, FL 33160
description: Daily Resort Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: guest internet access: two beach chairs: two beach towels: 25% discount on food in restaurant outlets: two bottles of water: 15% salon discount: local and toll-free calls. The Doubletree Ocean Point Resort & Spa - Miami Beach North is a full service, beachfront resort hotel and spa situated between the Bal Harbour and Aventura areas of the northern section of Miami Beach. Ideally located in sunny south Florida, the Ocean Point Resort hotel is less than 30 minutes from either Miami International Airport (MIA) or Fort Lauderdale / Hollywood International Airport (FLL). This exquisite resort hotel features spacious guestrooms and one- or two-bedroom apartment-style suites with fully equipped kitchens. Our luxurious accommodations include refrigerator, wet bar, microwave, washer and dryer, high-speed internet access (wired and wireless), and panoramic ocean views from all guest rooms. Most rooms and suites have a balcony. At the Ocean Point Resort, we believe in pampering. Indulge yourself with full-service European-style spa and beauty salon treatments. Have a massage in one of our hotel oceanside cabanas - you're worth it. We recommend that you call 786-528-2900 in advance of your arrival for Spa reservations and treatment details. Dine overlooking the Atlantic Ocean in The View restaurant, serving Continental cuisine and fresh seafood with a Miami flair. Or, try The Market Coffee Shop & Deli for lighter fare in casual surroundings just steps from the pool and beach. For special events or social occasions, our versatile meeting rooms and outdoor terraces can accommodate up to 300 guests. Allow our talented professionals to create your dream wedding reception in the most spectacular atmosphere. Go snorkeling or sport fishing. Relax under a beach umbrella. Explore the exclusive Bal Harbour Shops or Aventura Mall. Enjoy sightseeing and gallery-browsing along Miami Beach's historic Art Deco District. Take the family to Miami Seaquarium or Parrot Jungle. There is so much to see and do in the Miami area - or opt to do nothing at all. Our attentive, caring hotel staff looks forward to welcoming you to the Doubletree Ocean Point Resort & Spa with our special, signature warm chocolate-chip cookie at check-in.Hilton

name: Hampton Inn Miami/Dadeland
description: Hampton Inn Miami Dadeland hotel is located off 70th Ave.-Dadeland in the prestigious shopping district of Dadeland. We are 10 miles south of Miami International Airport and 4 miles west of Tamiami Executive Airport. Dadeland/Miami, Florida area attractions include shopping malls, historical sites, Viscaya Museum, Fairchild Garden, Metro Zoo and the University of Miami. Within.5 mile you can dine at Benihana, Cheesecake Factory, Johnny rockets, or Mandarin Express. Our Hampton Inn Miami Dadeland hotel of Florida features 5-stories with interior corridors in a Mediterranean style, 131 hotel rooms, heated hotel pool and whirlpool, meeting room that accommodates 25 people and state-of-the-art business center. Amenities you will find at our Hampton Inn Miami Dadeland hotel of Florida include complimentary continental breakfast, in-room coffeemaker and TV with cable. We also offer connecting hotel rooms, cribs, hair dryers, irons, and refrigerators. Laundry/valet services, audio visual equipment, and meeting/banquet facilities are available at Hampton Inn Miami Dadeland hotel of Florida for a nominal fee. We love having you here at the Hampton Inn Miami Dadeland hotel in Florida.Hilton

name: Miami Marriott Dadeland
description: The Miami Marriott Dadeland boasts 302 beautiful guest rooms including our newly renovated art-inspired Design Guest Rooms, a welcoming lobby with complimentary internet access and 35,000 sq ft of newly renovated flexible meeting space. Located in the heart of South Miami, we are minutes away from Downtown Miami and South Beach. Our hotel is steps away to Dadeland Mall, restaurants and activities. Located near the Historical Coral Gables, Sunset Place Shops, The Falls and Merrick Park, makes us an extraordinary shopping destination. We are a short driving distance to Baptist & South Miami Hospitals, Univ. of Miami and Florida International University. The Metro Rail station adjacent to the hotel provides ease of transportation to the Miami Airport and much more. International cuisine can be enjoyed at Whitney’s Restaurant opened for breakfast and lunch. Looking to relax after a long day, unwind in the Le Mirage Lounge or sit poolside overlooking the sites of Miami.Marriott

name: Kimpton Surfcomber Hotel
description: As part of the candy-colored historic Art Deco District, Kimpton Surfcomber Hotel welcomes you to the sea-and-be-seen revelry of Miami’s South Beach. Famed nightlife, shops, cafes and galleries are a stroll away. But even without leaving the hotel you can soak up the fun with Kimpton Surfcomber’s playful “Daylife.” Think ice cream sundaes by our glorious pool, bocce ball tournaments at a private sandy oasis and beach side food and beverage service on the beach. Some say we’re the most social hotel around. To that we say, SoBe it.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Extended Stay America Premier Suites - Miami - Airport - Doral - 87th Avenue South
description: Miami International Airport is 6.8 mi from this hotel in Florida. Kitchenette facilities are provided in all studios at this hotel. An on-site launderette is also available. Spacious studios are decorated in neutral colors with bright accents at the Extended Stay America - Miami - Airport - Doral - 87th Ave S. Each has a seating area, cable TV and is air conditioned. Free grab-and-go breakfast including breakfast bars, muffins, hot cereal, coffee and tea is served every morning. Weekly housekeeping services are provided for free and daily provided for a fee. Towels and linen can be exchanged at the front desk. The Museum of the Americas is 2 mi from the hotel. Extended Stay America - Miami - Airport - Doral - 87th Ave S is 2 miles from Carlos Albizu University.

name: South Beach Hotel
description: Discover a chic, contemporary hotel located in the heart of Miami Beachs fashionable Collins Park neighborhood on 21st Street, walking distance from the ocean and Miami Beach Convention Center. With its relaxing ambiance and personable staff, the SBH South Beach Hotel offers the amenities and conveniences of larger luxury hotels in a more intimate setting.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hampton Inn and Suites Miami Kendall
description: Our hotel is one mile from Miami Executive Airport and four miles from Zoo Miami. You’ll find plenty of shopping and dining at The Palms at Town & Country, just six miles away. Downtown Miami and South Beach are within 30 miles of us. Enjoy our fitness center, outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi, and free breakfast.Hilton

name: Riu Plaza Miami Beach
description: Located 525 feet’ walk from the beach, this Miami Beach hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace. The hotel is 9 minutes’ drive from the shops and restaurants of Lincoln Road and offers free WiFi to guests. A flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, and coffee-making facilities are available in Hotel Riu Plaza Miami Beach rooms. Private bathrooms feature a shower and hairdryer. Select rooms offer a sea view. A fitness center is available. This beachfront property offers bicycle hires, concierge services, and a 24-hour front desk. Dining options include a poolside snack bar and a buffet restaurant that features salads, fresh fruit, cheese plates, and more. Guests can explore the waters, architecture, and nightlife of South Beach (2.2 mi) or play a round of golf at Bayshore Golf Course (1.6 mi). Miami Beach Convention Center is 1.5 miles’ drive away while Miami International Airport is 17 minutes' drive by car.

name: Edition Miami Beach
description: With luxury hotel accommodations and an oceanfront setting, The Miami Beach EDITION is an ideal escape. Local venues and iconic attractions, including Miami Beach Convention Center, the Fillmore and Perez Art Museum Miami, are minutes away. Return from the beach and experience exceptional dining at our restaurants developed by Michelin-starred Chef Jean-Georges Vongerichten. This Miami Beach hotel boasts two ocean-facing pools, a wellness spa with a gym, a nightclub, a bowling alley and an ice-skating rink, as well as chic indoor and outdoor event space. Decorated in sophisticated style, every hotel room features large windows and views of the city, pool or ocean. Unwind from the Miami Beach scene in your pet-friendly room that showcases plush bedding, a marble bathroom, a desk and free Wi-Fi. Revel in the living and dining areas of our oceanfront suites, ideal for entertaining family and friends. Our luxury bungalows promote a sense of privacy and well-being with their plunge pools and serene terraces.Marriott

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Miami Airport West/Doral
description: Connect to premium services and amenities at AC Hotel Miami Airport West/Doral. Attention to detail and a modern mindset define us. Our premium location near dining, entertainment and shopping options affords easy access to downtown Doral and CityPlace Doral. Access to over 200 global corporate offices. Enjoy in-room amenities including mini-refrigerators and free high-speed Wi-Fi. In place of room service and a club lounge, you can find a great selection of quick snacks in the AC Store and join us in the AC Lounge, where we offer a selection of tapas-inspired small bites nightly. Have a question about the city? Talk to our bartenders who are always happy to offer the real inside scoop. Spanish roots and European culture complement our lobby's spacious open-floor plan, and free parking and meeting rooms are also available. Welcome to an elevated state of mind at AC Hotel Miami Airport West/Doral.Marriott

name: The Standard Spa Miami Beach
description: Featuring a full-service spa, this adult-only Miami Beach hotel also features rooms with a view of the lush gardens, Biscayne Bay, and outdoor infinity pool. Guests will be 12 minutes' walk to Lincoln Road Mall and 5 minutes' drive to South Beach. The spa amenities, which are complimentary to hotel guests, include a Turkish Hamam with heated marble, hemlock sauna, eucalyptus steam room, ice room, hot tub, cold plunge and gym are also on site. Massages, facials, manicures, pedicures, and full-body scrubs are offered as well at the Spa of The Standard Miami Beach, located in South Florida. The restaurant, Lido Bayside Grill, uses locally sourced ingredients and seasonal produce, with a global-inspired menu including expertly-grilled dishes, fried options, and chilled dishes. There is also an indoor healthy cafe restaurant and speakeasy-style bar and lounge. In addition to a bicycle hire and a private boat dock, guests can enjoy paddle boarding and kayaks. Miami International Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away.

name: Miami Lakes Hotel
description: Visit, play and experience the newly renovated Miami Lakes Hotel located in Miami lakes, fl. This upscale Florida contemporary hotel has just completed a full renovation of all 205 guest rooms and suites, the lobby and meeting space offering fresh vibrant colors, furnishings and fabrics to provide a warm welcoming home away from home for all of our guests to enjoy. This upscale hotel with resort amenities is home to the Miami Lakes golf course, one of Miami's best 18-hole championship golf courses and a favorite course for a Miami golf retreat. Other amenities include the 44,000 square foot state of the art Miami Lakes athletic club. Guest room furnishings are complete with wood flooring, sleek clean lines and neutral tones accented with vibrant pops of colors set in chic Florida contemporary comfort. Pillow top mattresses, custom toiletries, and extra pillows make for a comfortable stay. Some rooms offer pool views and look onto our lush tropical lagoon.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hilton Garden Inn Miami Airport West
description: The Hilton Garden Inn Miami Airport West hotel is conveniently located near the Miami International Airport. This Hilton Garden Inn hotel is just minutes away from all area major corporations and attractions including the Miami Cruise Port, South Beach and the Art Deco District, Downtown Miami, and the Doral Business Park. Guest rooms have features designed with you in mind, including: Great American Grill serving breakfast, lunch, dinner, and evening room service, 24-hour Pavilion Pantry convenience mart, Complimentary airport transportation, The Garden Sleep System bed, with non-allergenic feather pillows and duvet cover, In-room Cuisinart coffee maker, microwave, and mini-refrigerator, 32-inch high-definition, flat-screen TV with premium channels and Lodgenet movies, Complimentary high-speed wired and wireless Internet with remote printing provided by PrinterOn, in all guestrooms, Flexible workspace with Ergonomic Mirra Desk Chair, USA Today delivered Monday-Friday, Fitness center with cardio equipment, free weights and whirlpool, Outdoor heated pool. The hotel is a place for your events and meetings - Leave the details to the hotel event professionals: Dedicated sales team to focus on the details, Intimate function rooms with state-of-the-art technology, Business center with fax, print, and copying services. The hotel is close to corporations, government facilities, and local attractions, including: 1.5 miles from Cisco Systems, 1 mile from FedEx, 1.5 miles from General Electric, 3 miles from Oracle, 4 miles from 3M, 12 miles to Miami Beach, 9 miles to the Port of Miami. ***** Everything. Right where you need it. *****Hilton

name: TownePlace Suites by Marriott Miami Lakes
description: TownePlace Suites Miami Lakes Hotel offers all-suite extended stay accommodations. Our hotel is convenient to Opa Locka Airport (OPA) and Miami International Airport (MIA) near world-class restaurants, Premier shopping, Hard Rock Stadium, and several golf courses. Enjoy one of our many studio or two bedroom suites, all with fully-equipped kitchens, ample work space and comfortable bedding. Relax and enjoy the amenities that are ideal for short or extended-stays, including a complimentary hot breakfast daily, free high-speed Internet access, personalized voicemail, on-site business services and 24-hour staffing. A 24-hour guest laundry is also available at the hotel, Maintain your fitness routine in the hotel's exercise room or relax and unwind in the outdoor pool, or use the outdoor grill to fire up your meal. Your stay will be relaxing and productive at Towneplace Suites Miami Lakes, so sit back, relax and stay a while.Marriott

name: Sun Harbour Boutique Hotel
description: This Italian villa-style hotel is 1 block from Bal Harbor Beach and the boutiques at Bal Harbor Shops. It offers an in-ground hot tub and suites with free Wi-Fi. Each of the contemporary suites at Sun Harbor Boutique Hotel feature a full kitchen and views of the courtyard. Guests can relax in the living area and watch a DVD on the flat-screen TV. The front desk of this design hotel is open until 7 pm. Lounge chairs are available in the tropical courtyard. The Normandy Shores Golf Course is 3 miles from the Sun Harbor Hotel. Miami Beach is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Comfort Inn and Suites Miami International Airport
description: Enjoy cozy accommodations, professional service, and our famous waffles with breakfast each morning at our Comfort Inn and Suites Miami International Airport hotel in Miami Springs, FL. Amenities include free WiFi, free hot breakfast, meeting space, business center, fitness center, outdoor pool and sundeck. Guest rooms feature flat screen TV, pillowtop mattress, desk, microwave, refrigerator and more. Our hotel is close to Miami International Airport, the Airbus Training Center, and many dining and shopping options. We are just 10 minutes to the beach and easy access to popular local attractions like Hiaaleah Park, downtown Miami, Port of Miami, Doral Country Club and Bayside Marketplace. Complete your plans for a Miami getaway by booking a room at our hotel in Miami Springs, FL. You can also earn rewards, including free nights and gift cards, with our Choice Privileges Rewards program. No Pets Allowed.Choice Hotels

name: Marriott Vacation Club Pulse, South Beach
description: Treat yourself to an unforgettable stay at Marriott Vacation Club Pulse, South Beach on Miami Beach's swanky Ocean Drive near electrifying nightlife, café-style dining and upscale shopping. Boasting open and airy studio, guest room and two-bedroom suite lodging options across from the beach, our well-situated vacation ownership property is only minutes from the South Beach Art Deco District, Kaseya Center arena, the markets on Lincoln Road and some of Miami's finest restaurants. Unwind at our stately Mediterranean Revival gem with a historic exterior and unique contemporary design, including a landmark red tile roof, graceful columns and updated accommodations. Relax on stylish furnishings and stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi — all with no destination fees. Or, grab a drink and gaze out over Miami Beach from our exquisite Rooftop Terrace and enjoy panoramic views and warm Florida breezes. Our comfortable vacation rentals are sure to provide you with a memorable experience in lively South Beach.Marriott

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami Downtown/Brickell
description: Located within walking distance of the downtown Brickell Financial District, Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami Downtown/Brickell is near a variety of restaurants, bars and nightlife. You’ll enjoy easy access to I-95 and the Miami International Airport from our extended stay hotel. Tour the nearby Vizcaya Museum & Gardens, a National Historic Landmark, or take your family for a fun day at the Miami Seaquarium located on Virginia Key and nearby Key Biscayne. Unwind in a spacious studio or one-bedroom suite. Our accommodations offer seating and sleeping areas, fully equipped kitchens, complimentary internet access and sofa beds. One-bedroom suites offer separate living areas and bedrooms, and a few rooms have partial views of Miami and the Bay. Join us each morning for a complimentary hot full breakfast, and enjoy dinner with drinks* after a busy day on Wednesday evenings. Stock up on snacks, beverages, meals and travel essentials at the 24-hour Suite Shop®. Relax on our second floor pool deck overlooking downtown Miami, and cool down with a swim in the covered outdoor swimming pool. Both the fitness gym and business center are open 24 hours. For business or social events, our downtown Miami/Brickell hotel accommodates up to 50 guests in a meeting room offering natural lighting. *Subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.Hilton

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Miami Sunny Isles Beach
address: 17700 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: Soak up revitalizing sunshine, ocean breezes and stunning views at Residence Inn Miami Sunny Isles Beach, a hotel near Fort Lauderdale International Airport. Our extended-stay all suites hotel is directly across from the stunning white sands of Sunny Isles Beach and close to North Miami Beach’s fashion-forward shopping and entertainment. Our complimentary buffet breakfast energizes you for a fun-filled day in Sunny Isles Beach and free high-speed internet lets you search for fun things to do near the hotel. Cool off in our rooftop pool offering incredible views of the Miami Beach shoreline and blue skies before returning to your hotel suite. All pet-friendly suites at the hotel feature the amenities you need to cook a full meal, stretch out, sleep peacefully and work comfortably. Plus, with the proximity to Fort Lauderdale International Airport, our hotel near Oleta River State Park gives you easy access to both natural beauty and convenient travel options during your stay.Marriott

name: The Savoy Hotel & Beach Club
description: Each spacious suite at this hotel in Miami Beach offers Wi-Fi. This European-style hotel offers direct beach access and features 2 outdoor pools and private beach access. The suites at The Savoy Hotel include tea and coffee-making facilities. Each suite also provides a spacious seating area. Secluded in a 2-acre courtyard, the Hotel Savoy includes a restaurant that serves American cuisine indoors or outside on the patio. Breakfast, lunch and dinner are available. Guests can relax on the raised sun decks that overlook the ocean at the hotel. Lummus Park is within a 5-minute walk from Savoy Hotel. Marjory Stoneman Douglas Ocean Beach Park is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Newport Beachside Hotel & Resort
address: 16701 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: No description found

name: Beacon Hotel South Beach
description: Located on lively Ocean Drive in Miami Beach's Art Deco District, this hotel features an on-site restaurant and free continental breakfast. Rooms include free Wi-Fi. Lummus Beach is across the street. A flat-screen cable TV and an iPod dock are provided in all bright-colored rooms at Beacon Hotel. A small refrigerator, beach towels, and beach chairs are also provided. The Place serves Mediterranean dishes, including fresh Florida seafood, for lunch and dinner with both casual patio and indoor seating. The lobby bar is open all day. This hotel is within 2 minutes' walk of restaurants and shops. Bayshore Golf Course and Miami Beach Botanical Garden are a 5-minute drive away.

name: La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Miami Airport East
address: 3501 N.W. Le Jeune Road, Miami, FL 33142
description: Just 20 minutes from Dolphin Stadium, the La Quinta Inn & Suites Miami Airport East is near all of your favorite attractions and only a mile from Miami International Airport (free shuttle service). We are just minutes from the Sports Complex (American Airlines Arena, Marlins Park, and Doral Golf & Resort). In less than 15 minutes, reach famed South Beach, Coconut Grove, beautiful Bayside, and the Miami Beach Convention Center. You will find plenty of great eateries within walking distance as well as shopping at Dolphin Mall and the Merchandise Mart. Great service begins mornings at the La Quinta Inn Miami Airport East, with a complimentary Free Bright Side BreakfastTM in the lobby. Free high-speed Internet access is included in all rooms.The computer center in the lobby has high-speed Internet access. We have a crystal-clear outdoor pool for your enjoyment. There is a guest laundry facility and plenty of parking, so book as many rooms as you want and stay as long as you like! Centrally located five miles west of downtown, we are convenient to Florida International University, the University of Miami, and the US Southern Command Center. Homestead Air Reserve Base is 25 miles away.Wyndham

name: Red Roof PLUS+ Miami Airport
description: This all nonsmoking hotel is only 5 minutes' drive from Miami International Airport. The hotel offers free airport transfers, and free Wi-Fi. Laundry facilities are also available at this pet-friendly hotel. Guest rooms at the Miami Airport Red Roof Plus are equipped with flat-screen cable TVs and ironing facilities. Some rooms feature microwaves and mini-refrigerators. Miami city center is 10 minutes' drive from the Red Roof Plus, and South Beach is 15 minutes' drive away. Flagler Dog Racing is only 1.9 mi away.

name: Candlewood Suites Miami Exec Airport - Kendall
description: Welcome to the Candlewood Suites Hotel Miami Executive Airport - Kendall. You can enjoy the most modern and convenient extended stay hotel in Kendall. Business travelers and adventure seekers looking for the perfect home away from home, look no further for short term or extended stays in our hotel suites. Our hotel is right next to the Miami Executive Airport and just 20 miles away from Miami International Airport (MIA). With world class shopping centers including The Palms at Town & Country, Dolphin Mall and Dadeland Mall. Also conveniently located just minutes away from Miami Dade College, Baptist Hospital, Zoo Miami, Gold Coast Railroad Museum, Wings over Miami Museum, Kendall Ice Arena, Monkey Jungle, Black Point Marina, Homestead Miami Speedway, Everglades National Park, Vizcaya Museum and Gardens, and downtown Miami just a short drive away. Our spacious suites with fully-equipped kitchens, complimentary guest laundry, complimentary parking, 24-hour gazebo and barbecue area, outdoor pool, Fitness Center and signature amenities will make for a perfect stay. Stress free weekly housekeeping services will make for a more relaxing stay. Free high-speed Internet access, large work spaces with a desk chair, and recliner, give you all the comforts you need to stay relaxed.The hotel has a large-scale generator to operate all the areas of the hotel during power outages.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Lorraine Hotel
description: The Lorraine Hotel is an Oceanside hotel designed for a wide range of clients that want to be right on the beach. It offers comfort and affordability in an unrivaled, convenient, and lively SoBe location.The hotels important Art Deco corner building is located at the intersection of the famous Collins Ave. and 26th Street and nestled on the boardwalk of Miami Beach.The Lorraine Hotel is just blocks away from the Convention Center and the main attractions ofSouth Beach.iHotelier/iStay

Digital programming and iPod docking stations are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and a communal living room. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-out, and a 24-hour front desk. This hotel has 4 meeting rooms available for events. Property Location With a stay at citizenM Miami Worldcenter, you'll be centrally located in Miami, just a 4-minute walk from Miami-Dade Arena and 6 minutes by foot from Bayside Marketplace. name: Homewood Suites Miami Airport/Blue Lagoon
description: The newly renovated Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami-Airport/Blue Lagoon hotel in Florida is located minutes from the Miami International Airport - 3.6 miles - and Downtown Miami and it is ideally situated for leisure activities on a private secluded peninsula in the heart of Blue Lagoon a 100-acre fresh water lagoon. The Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami-Airport/Blue Lagoon hotel is also within walking distance to several restaurants and offers complimentary shuttle service to and from Miami International Airport 7am to 9pm, every hour on the hour.Hilton

name: Hilton Cabana Miami Beach
description: Daily Resort Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: Guest internet access: 2 beach chairs and towels: 2-hour bicycle rental: 20 minutes non-motorized water sports equipment rental: 10% off dinner at hotel restaurant: 2 refillable/recyclable aluminum water bottles. Situated in the heart of Miami Beach, Hilton Cabana Miami Beach is an upscale hotel set within 119 feet of oceanfront property. Located on Collins Avenue at 63rd Street, the hotel is just north of South Beach - in the center of south Florida’s best attractions and trendy neighborhoods. Close to Lincoln Road, Ocean Drive, Aventura Mall and Bal Harbour, the hotel is convenient to the Port of Miami, Miami Convention Center, restaurants, entertainment and nightlife. The hotel features 231 newly renovated oversized guest rooms with one king or two queen beds, plus an array of suites - each with 55-inch flat-screen TV, MP3 player, laptop-size safe, large work desk with ergonomic chair and windows that open. Most guest rooms feature ocean, Intracoastal or pool views and many have balconies. Hilton Cabana Miami Beach offers many on-site amenities including two outdoor pools and beach-side service. Want to catch one of Miami Beach's famous festivals or events? Check out the Yearly Boat Show in February or the Ultra Music Festival and Winter Music Conference in March. The Miami International Airport is also close by, which means getting to and from Miami Beach is a breeze. Inside this beautiful, environmentally friendly Miami Beach hotel, guests will enjoy spacious, 100% non-smoking guest rooms, complete with cable satellite television, an in-room refrigerator and free wireless high-speed internet access. Most of our rooms offer ocean views. Other amenities at this Miami Beach hotel include a full-service restaurant, the Pool Bar and Grill, a sparkling outdoor swimming pool and fully equipped exercise facility. Business guests of the Best Western Plus Atlantic Beach Resort will also appreciate the fully equipped business center, on-site meeting and banquet facilities that can accommodate up to 150 people, and a close proximity to local businesses and the Miami Beach Convention Center. For a perfect way to spend your oceanfront vacation, book your stay at the Best Western Plus Atlantic Beach Resort and save today. Enjoy your stay. Management reserves the right to refuse to provide accommodation to persons less than 21 years of age unless accompanied by a parent.bestwestern.com

name: Grand Beach Hotel Surfside
description: The Grand Beach Hotel Surfside in Miami, Florida is situated in the town of Surfside, nestled between Miami Beach and Bal Harbour. Based on the success of the Grand Beach Hotel Miami Beach, we have refined the ideas and advantages which made our first hotel in Miami so popular.Synxis

name: Holiday Inn Miami Beach - Oceanfront, An IHG Hotel
description: Miami Beach Oceanfront Hotel with Premium Location Welcome to the tropically inspired Holiday Inn Miami Beach - Oceanfront hotel, where our 1950's Miami Modern (MiMo) exterior blends seamlessly with vibrant contemporary South Beach style to wrap you in modern comfort. Eleven miles east of Miami International Airport (MIA), our Miami Beach oceanfront hotel is located where I-195 meets A1A at the Atlantic Ocean. Our oceanfront Miami Beach hotel offers you an unparalleled location, right off Collins Avenue and just two miles from South Beach; home of the best clubs, dining, and shopping. With the Miami Beach beachwalk at your doorstep, take a moonlit stroll on the beach by night, play in the surf by day or simply relax by our large pool overlooking the beach and our lush, tropical garden with its hammock oasis. Be sure to grab a mojito and a delicious meal at our Paradise Café and Blue Parrot Bar. You will appreciate the close proximity of our hotel to the Miami Beach Convention Center and Lincoln Road shopping, just two miles away. Don’t miss the opportunity to take in the art and culture that make Miami Beach such a popular destination. The Art Deco district, Miami Children’s Museum, Holocaust Memorial, Phillip and Patricia Frost Museum of Science, and the Bass Museum of Art are within a short drive of our hotel. Ask about area transportation via the free Miami Beach Trolley.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Whitelaw Hotel
description: Opened in 1936, Whitelaw Hotel is set in Miami Beach and offers valet parking, free Wi-Fi and a rooftop terrace. It is also a five-minute walk from Ocean Drive and the Wolfsonian-FIU, and is close to many of the area's popular attractions. The hotel has 49 rooms and has been recently refurbished. Welcoming and professional team members are available 24 hours a day. The rooms are air conditioned and include a private bathroom, a mini bar and a refrigerator. Bathrobes are also available for extra comfort. Miami Beach's attractions, such as the Jewish Museum of Florida and Lummus Park, are within a 10-minute walk of Hotel Whitelaw Miami. There are also a variety of quality restaurants and bars close by.Revato

name: President Villa
description: Featuring a rooftop terrace and a rooftop pool, President Villa is situated in Miami Beach and provides art deco accommodation. It offers 3-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. There are a variety of amenities available to those staying at the hotel, such as a 24-hour reception, valet parking and free Wi-Fi. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide local information. For the convenience of those staying at President Villa, rooms feature all the necessities, such as a private bathroom, a refrigerator and direct pool access. They provide a laptop safe, bottled water and a flat-screen TV. The hotel is ideally situated for exploring Miami Beach with the Wolfsonian-FIU within walking distance. It is also within walking distance of Lincoln Road, Lummus Park and Ocean Drive.Revato

name: Holiday Inn Express Doral Miami, An IHG Hotel
description: A brand new, fresh, contemporary hotel with spaces that enable guests to be productive, connect with friends, family, and colleagues, and wake up feeling refreshed. Individuals and families stay with us while traveling globally and locally for business and leisure. They seek high-quality, affordable, and reliable choices, and value real, human connection. Located in close proximity to Doral's vibrant shopping districts including, Miami International Mall, Dolphin Mall and CityPlace Doral, our guests have a variety of entertainment options such as, dining, comedy, bowling, movies, nightlife and upscale shopping.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Miami Beach Surfside
description: Perched between the Atlantic Ocean and the Intracoastal, the Residence Inn Miami Beach Surfside is located alongside Collins Ave. right in the middle of a vibrant urban area in the charming town of Surfside. The Town of Surfside is an uptown beach town brimming with great local restaurants and a thriving small community. Whether you're here for business, the beach, shopping, or exploring the culture, you will find an escape in this ocean beachside haven set south of Bal Harbour and north of Miami Beach. Our all-suite hotel is ideal for weekend visits, extended project stays, relocation, and everything in between. Our Surfside hotel offers a rooftop pool deck complete with cabanas, perfect for relaxing and basking in the sun. Residence Inn Miami Beach Surfside offers 1,000 sq ft of meeting space ideal for corporate meetings and special occasions. Planning a special event? Host a memorable soiree on the Rooftop Terrace or Outdoor Arboretum. Enjoy a resort-style stay at our North Miami Beach hotel.Marriott

name: Days Inn by Wyndham Miami Airport North
description: Days Inn Miami Airport North close to Miami International Airport offering free transportation from 6am to 1am to and from the airport. Enjoy wireless internet access swimming pool restaurant. Car rental in the lobby. There are several local restaurants including a Subway on site Honduras and a diner all within 2-3 easy to walk blocks.Wyndham

name: Sole Miami, A Noble House Resort
address: 17315 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: This oceanfront hotel features direct beach access, sea and pool view restaurant with a bar. Shopping, dining and entertainment at Miami Beach are 20 minute's drive away. Aventura Mall and Bal Harbor Shops are both within 3.7 mi of the property. Sole' Miami, A Noble House Resort hotel guest rooms are furnished with iPod docking stations and flat-screen cable TVs. Suites offer a seating area and all rooms include a private balcony. Sole' Miami, A Noble House Resort features an outdoor swimming pool with ocean views. Guests can also take advantage of the tour desk for help discovering the area. Miami Beach's historic Art Deco district, which offers unique shops and famous restaurants, is also close by. Oleta River State Park is 10 minutes' drive from the hotel.

name: Marseilles Beachfront Hotel
description: Located in the heart of the historic South Beach Art Deco District, the Marseilles Hotel is within walking distance of Ocean Drive, Lincoln Road shops and The Miami Beach Convention center. Hotel Marseilles is a 100% non-smoking property.Enjoy a boutique room of your choice ranging from the mesmerizing Ocean Views to the intimate seclusion of Private Hot Tub Suites. Awaken your senses with a delectable breakfast at Chloes Patio, bask in the sun with a poolside luncheon at The Backyard, and as the sun sets, immerse yourself in the vibrant South Beach nightlife while relishing a sensational dinner at Chloes Patio. Envelop yourself in the enchantment of our exquisite Backyard oasis, a true masterpiece boasting an expansive, heated pool, exclusive cabanas featuring floating sunbeds, all embraced by lush botanical artistry, mere steps away from the caressing embrace of the ocean waves.iHotelier/iStay

name: La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Miami Lakes
description: Only 8 minutes from Hard Rock Stadium. The La Quinta Inn & Suites Miami Lakes delivers superior value for travelers to Miami or Hialeah with convenient access to major roadways and exceptional service from its cordial staff. Located only fifteen miles from Miami International Airport, this contemporary hotel is an ideal choice for guests planning to visit Don Shula Golf Resort, Hard Rock Stadium, Main Street, Hialeah Race Track, and Miami's most popular beaches. Shopping opportunities are abundant, as the Okeechobee Flea Market is 3 miles away, while Westland Mall, Pembroke Pines Mall, Aventura Mall, and Dolphin Mall are just a short drive from the hotel. The hotel is also located a half mile from offices for American Express-Latin Division and Xerox. Each of our spacious rooms feature free high-speed Internet access, a microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, expanded cable channels, and much more. The hotel offers refreshing outdoor pool, on-site fitness center, and a delicious Free Bright Side BreakfastTM.Wyndham

name: Private Residences At Hotel Arya By Sofla Vacations
description: Located within the Sonesta Coconut Grove Hotel, the Private Residences at Sonesta by SoFLA Vacations offer a heated outdoor pool, hot tub, free WiFi, and free private on-site parking. Miami city center is 4.3 mi away. Every suite and apartment has a seating area and a dining table. Apartments have a full kitchen including an oven, stove, and dishwashwer. Ocean, skyline, and river views are available. Private Residences at Sonesta by SoFLA Vacations features a sauna, fully equipped fitness center, and 2 squash courts. A 24-hour front desk and room service are offered for convenience. Guests can enjoy a meal of continental and Peruvian specialties at either of the 2 on-site restaurants which overlook Coconut Grove and Sailboat Bay. CocoWalk with chic shopping venues is 3 minutes' away. Miami Beach is 8.1 mi from Private Residences at Sonesta by SoFLA Vacations, and the nearest airport, Miami Airport, is 5 mi from the property.

description: Welcome to the Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Kendall East Miami. The beautiful Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Kendall East Miami is located in Kendall, FL and is an all-suite 100% non-smoking hotel, conveniently located one-quarter mile off the Florida Turnpike at Kendall Drive/SW 88th Street, 30 minutes from Miami International Airport (MIA) and three miles from Kendall-Tamiami Airport. With the newly renovated Palms at Town & Country Mall across the street and Dadeland Mall just ten minutes to our east, plus numerous restaurants within walking distance, our hotel provides the best value for your dollar.Families will love staying at our all-suite Miami-Kendall hotel. Our favorable location offers easy access to popular Miami attractions, including Zoo Miami, Miami Seaquarium, Jungle Island, the South Beach Art Deco District and Homestead Miami Speedway.Business travelers will find that our all-suite hotel, located in S.W. Miami, provides them with access to numerous companies, such as Baptist Health South Florida, the University of Miami, Assurant Group, Florida International University, Miami Dade College and Florida Power & Light. You will enjoy our Kendall hotel amenities, including free high-speed Internet access, an outdoor pool, a well-equipped Fitness Center and our free Express Start breakfast buffet.
