description: This Miami Beach, Florida hotel is 272 feet from the beach and 400 feet from the ocean. Features include an outdoor pool, fitness center, and free WiFi. A kitchenette, living room, and queen-size sofa bed are provided in each suite at Crystal Beach Suites Oceanfront Hotel. Premium suites include granite countertops and 2 larger flat-screen televisions. A laundry, ATM cash machine, and drink and snack vending machines are on site. Guests will also have access to a boarding pass computer and printer, luggage weight scale, and ice machines. This Miami Beach Crystal Beach Hotel is within a 10-minute drive of South Beach and Bal Harbour. Aventura Mall is less than a 20-minute drive away.

Towels and linen can be exchanged at the front desk. Every room is equipped with a kitchenette that includes a refrigerator and microwave. All rooms have bedding with colorful patterns, wood furnishings, and cable TV. A fitness center is on site at the Miami Springs Extended Stay as well as laundry facilities. Miami city center is 5 miles away and the beach is 15 minutes’ drive from this extended stay hotel. The Miami International Mall is less than 10 miles away.

The kitchenette has a stovetop, refrigerator, and sink. Guest laundry facilities are available at this hotel, which also offers 24-hour reception. Free grab-and-go breakfast including breakfast bars, muffins, hot cereal, coffee and tea is served every morning. Weekly housekeeping services are provided for free and daily provided for a fee. Towels and linen can be exchanged at the front desk Miami Beach is 16 miles from the Extended Stay America - Miami - Airport - Doral. The Miami Zoo is 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: TownePlace Suites by Marriott Miami Kendall West
description: Looking for a hotel in Miami can be challenging, therefore the TownePlace Suites Miami Kendall West is the best choice when traveling to South Florida.Our roomy studios come with fully equipped kitchens, smart TV’s, Free Wi-Fi and spacious workstation. Travelers can prepare their favorite recipe in their studios or grill on the BBQ in our lakeview terrace. What’s unique at our hotel? Guests can socialize in our vibrant full bar.We are within walking distance to West Kendall Baptist Hospital, restaurants, and just minutes away from Miami Executive Airport.Our guests love our proximity to Dadeland Mall and car races at Homestead Speedway. Our strategic location places you at the center of it all - easily wander to downtown Miami, Zoo Miami, Wyndwood Walls, Seaquarium, Bayside MarketPlace and the turquoise beaches of south beach.Marriott

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Miami Beach South Beach
description: Find the pace that suits you best at Residence Inn Miami Beach South Beach. Conveniently situated near Miami Beach Drive, our family-friendly hotel offers easy access to downtown Miami and the international airport. Explore the Art Deco Historic District, The Fillmore Miami Beach and the Miami Beach Convention Center, then browse Lincoln Road Mall's world-class shops and restaurants before relaxing on our rooftop patio with South Beach views. Our hotel features a fitness center, beauty shop and laundry facility for added convenience. Stay connected with free Wi-Fi in the business center and host meetings in our event venue. Begin your day in Miami Beach with complimentary breakfast, and enjoy pet-friendly rooms with plush beds, pull-out sofas, fully equipped kitchenettes and flat-screen TVs with HBO. Some Churchill Suites Monte Carlo Miami Beach apartments have a balcony with an ocean or bay view. A hot tub is available to guests at this Miami Beach Churchill Suite Monte Carlo Miami Beach property. Valet parking is provided on site for an additional fee. The Miami Beach Convention Center is 3.9 mi away. The property is also 4 mi from the Jackie Gleason Theater of the Performing Arts and 30 minutes’ drive from the Miami International Airport.

description: Only a few blocks from the beach and located close to motorway I-95, this Miami city center hotel provides guests with comfortable accommodations in a convenient location. Guests at the Miami Sun can enjoy a fresh smoothie or a light meal at the on-site restaurant or take advantage of the hotel's laundry facilities.

All public and private spaces at Blanc Kara are nonsmoking. Free WiFi is available in every room. Valet parking is available at an extra cost. South Pointe Park is just 0.3 miles away. A continental breakfast is offered and free WiFi is available. Beach towels are available for guests’ convenience, and the front desk is staffed 24 hours a day. The Miami International Airport is around a 15-minute drive from the hotel.

The Goodtime Hotel offers air conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV, luxury toiletries and blackout curtains. Each has a bathroom that provides bathrobes and a shower. Some choices during your stay are El Pollo Inka and Pollo Tropical. There is also plenty of great seafood available in the area. Head to a restaurant then out to experience Miami’s vibrant nightlife. Other popular attractions include the Ultra-Music Festival, the Everglades, Miami Beach Jungle Island, and Wynwood – the art district.The "Here For You" attitude of the staff and superior levels of cleanliness are what sets La Quinta Inn & Suites Miami Airport North apart. The hotel's central location, easy travel access, and proximity to local places of interest are additional bonuses that help guests to wake up on the bright side®. The hotel provides parking and is a short car ride from American Airlines Arena. Port of Miami and Bayfront Park are a short drive away.Revato

name: Hotel Aka Brickell
description: The following services and amenities are available, but with reduced service: Fitness Center, Breakfast, On-site Restaurant(s), Pool, Room Service, Valet Parking.The following services and amenities are currently not available: Business Center, Concierge, Spa.Decidedly modern, boldly conceived, and beautifully designed, this luxury hotel creates a unique sensory experience for its guests. The 203 guest rooms and 103 residence suites were stylishly created with a sophisticated traveler in mind, combining some of the finest services with high-tech facilities. Located in a concave building of glittering glass and steel, AKA Hotel Brickell features a minimalist and contemporary design, in the of heart Miami's business district. Our Brickell Avenue address provides guests with easy access to many area attractions, including South Beach, Coconut Grove and Key Biscayne, and is just 15 minutes from Miami International Airport. Overlooking the sparkling Biscayne Bay and within walking distance to a myriad of shopping and dining destinations, you couldn't be better placed. As perfectly formed as the Miami skyline, this sleek downtown luxury hotel offers an array of room options, including guest rooms, studios, and one and two bedroom residence suites. Capturing a sense of understated elegance, and accessorized with complementary elements of glass, wood, leather and metal, AKA Hotel Brickell welcomes you to experience the city's innate sense of style and flair. Experience a symphony of International flavors and style at Level 25 - Miami's only restaurant and lounge, 25 stories in the sky. Discover how world-class vintages of The Wine Attic pair perfectly with Atrio's progressive, global fare. After, whet your palate with a creative cocktail at The Bar, while sharing savory Spanish pintxos, perfectly executed with an innovative twist. Elevate your nose for wine with a fine selection of wines by the glass and personalized attention of our on-staff sommelier.FarePortal

name: The Vagabond Hotel
description: Re-defined. Re-invented. Re-imagined.Set to redefine its glamorous past as a fabled Rat Pack hangout, the Vagabond is back. An iconic mid-century modern Miami landmark, nestled within 56,000 sq. ft. of tropical poolside landscaping, this reinvented, newly renovated American Motel classic has been completely transformed into an uber-chic, twenty first century, retro-luxe, boutique hotel. Ideally located along the trendy Biscayne corridor - where art, entertainment, culture, cuisine, and history collide. The Vagabond is your perfect home away from home.Were happy to admit that we love the word free too. You can enjoy complimentary coffee and tea served all day in the lobby and then saunter over to our gym to burn off the not so free calories!iHotelier/iStay

name: Ocean Front Casablanca Studios With Full Kitchens & Beach Access By Bl Rentals
description: Ocean Front Resort Apartments offers self-catering accommodations with free WiFi in Miami Beach. Miami city center is 7.5 mi away. The accommodations features a cable TV. There is also a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven, stovetop, microwave, and coffee machine. Private parking is also available on site. Bed linens and towels are provided. Ocean Front Resort Apartments also includes an outdoor pool. Luggage storage is available for a small fee. The onsite Gallura restaurant offers Sicilian cuisine and a full breakfast buffet. Fort Lauderdale is 19 mi from Ocean Front Resort Apartments. The nearest airport is Miami Airport, 11 mi from the property. Guests must register with the hotel upon arrival. The registration fee $45, which is not included and must be paid upon arrival. Registration desk is not responsible for the reservation, please contact the assigned agent for any requests. All units are located at the Casablanca Hotel but are independently owned and operated. Please note there is a departure cleaning and daily maid services are not offered. Additional cleanings or towels and linen exchange may be requested 1 day in advance for an additional fee. Please note that pets under 9 kilograms are permitted. Additional fees may apply. Contact the property for details. Please note that room decor and style may vary from room selected. Exact room decor and style cannot be guaranteed. Please note that parking is subject to availability. Please note that the property is currently undergoing renovations from 09:00 to 17:00. Restaurant is under renovation.

name: Novotel Miami Brickell
description: Discover a tranquil retreat two blocks from the heart of the Financial District at Novotel Miami Brickell, one of the best hotels in Brickell Miami. Featuring a lobby design inspired by the city's beachfront culture and colors, our contemporary Downtown Miami hotel is adjacent to Simpson Park, a preserved swath of hardwood forest. Sweeping views of the tree canopy, framed by skyscrapers and sparkling Biscayne Bay, give our rooftop pool and bar the feel of a tropical resort.accorhotels.com

name: Blue House
address: 7533 Bounty Ave, North Bay Village, FL 33141
description: This property is a 20-minute walk from the beach. Blue House is located in Miami Beach, 3.7 miles from Holocaust Memorial, and has a garden, a terrace and a bar. The property is around 3.7 miles from Miami Beach Convention Center and 4 miles from Lincoln Road. The property is 5 miles from Art Deco Historic District and 5 miles from Ocean Drive. All rooms features air conditioning, a microwave, a toaster, a coffee machine, a bath, free toiletries and a desk. Each room includes a private bathroom, while selected rooms also feature a balcony and others also feature a garden view. At the guesthouse, rooms contain a seating area. A continental breakfast is served at the property. Jackie Gleason Theater of the Performing Arts is 3.9 miles from Blue House, while Versace Mansion is 5 miles from the property. Miami International Airport is 9 miles away. Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 9.1 for a two-person trip. This property is also rated for the best value in Miami Beach! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in this city. We speak your language! Your stay will include: Sun Deck TerraceExpedia

name: 2 Bedroom Ocean Drive Newly Renovated
description: 2 Bedroom Ocean Drive Newly Renovated is located in the South Beach district of Miami Beach, a 2-minute walk from Lummus Park Beach and 500 yards from South Pointe Park Beach. Free Wifi is featuredthroughout the property. Each unit comes with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, washing machine and coffee machine, as well as a kitchen. Popular points of interest near the condo hotel include Miami Beach, Fisher Island Beach and Art Deco Historic District. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 11 miles from 2 Bedroom Ocean Drive Newly Renovated.

name: AC Hotel By Marriott Miami Dadeland
description: AC Hotel Miami Dadeland offers modern accommodations with timeless European design. Perfectly located next to Dadeland Mall and walking distance to Dadeland South Metro Station. Downtown Dadeland is just a few minutes away and nearby attractions such as Fairchild Tropical Botanic Garden, Everglades, and University of Miami. Public spaces feature unique artwork, while guestrooms provide a modern oasis with wood look flooring, complimentary WiFi and 55" HDTV. Take a dip in the outdoor pool and grab a cocktail in the pool deck cocktail lounge featuring our signature AC gin and tonic. The AC Lounge is the place to unwind with carefully crafted cocktails and tapas style bites. If you are looking to hold a event or meeting, our 3,610 sq. ft. of venue space for up to 255 people offers flexible venues and an experienced event staff. Our unbeatable location lets you walk to Dadeland Mall for an lively day of shopping, dining and entertainment. We look forward to providing you excellent service!Marriott

name: Holiday Inn Port Of Miami-Downtown
description: Enjoy your stay near the Port of Miami The Holiday Inn Port of Miami-Downtown is the perfect place to stay for your next trip to Miami. Located just six minutes from the Port of Miami, our hotel is close to all the major attractions in the city. Within walking distance of our hotel, you'll find Bayside Marketplace, the Kaseya Center, & the American Airlines Arena. Bayside Marketplace is a must-visit for any shopper, with over 150 stores and restaurants. The Kaseya Center is a hub for technology and innovation, and the American Airlines Arena is home to the Miami Heat basketball team. The Metromover station behind our hotel makes it easy to get around Downtown Miami & Brickell. The Metromover is a free elevated train that connects major points of interest in the area. After a long day of exploring, return to our hotel to relax in our modern accommodations. Our rooms are spacious and comfortable, with free Wi-Fi, blackout shades, HDTVs with streaming capabilities, & a mini fridge. We offer specials & packages designed to make your stay even more enjoyable, & we have a variety of onsite amenities. Downtown Miami is a vibrant & exciting place to be, & it's known for hosting a variety of special events throughout the year. Some of the most popular events include the ING & Mercedes-Benz Marathon, Market America, Miami Film Festival & Book Fair, Art Basel, & Ultra Music Fest. Whatever brings you to Miami, enjoy your stay at The Holiday Inn Port of Miami-Downtown.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Intercontinental Miami, An IHG Hotel
description: An iconic fixture on the downtown Miami skyline for 40 years, InterContinental Miami boasts a waterfront location on Biscayne Bay, steps away from arts and entertainment in Miami’s Brickell neighborhood. A beacon for both business and leisure travelers, the hotel rises 34 stories over the city with breathtaking views of the Atlantic Ocean, Biscayne Bay and the Port of Miami. The hotel, which recently completed a $40 million renovation, features 652 newly redefined luxury guest rooms.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Aloft Miami Dadeland
description: Open spaces, open thinking and open expression at Aloft Miami Dadeland. After your day of travel or business, mingle with family and friends over craft cocktails and light fare at the W XYZ® bar, or grab a snack from Re:fuel by Aloft, our 24-hour pantry. When you need a moment to yourself, retreat to the modern comfort of our pet-friendly rooms, with complimentary Wi-Fi, ergonomic workstations and plush bedding. Additionally, our plug and play connectivity station charges all of your electronics and links to the flat-panel TV to maximize work and play. For those hoping to stay in shape during their visit, we provide a 24-hour fitness center, as well as an outdoor pool. Complimentary self-parking is available for hotel guests. We offer complimentary shuttle service to/from Miami International Airport (to be scheduled/upon request) as well as shuttle service to the Port of Miami ($22 per person, 5 person minimum). Daily Housekeeping service available. Aloft Miami Dadeland offers an experience you won't forget!Marriott

name: The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne Miami
address: 455 Grand Bay Drive, Key Biscayne, FL 33149
description: Escape to a luxury Miami Beach resort that exudes the classic charm of South Florida. Located on an exclusive five-mile-long barrier island, The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne, Miami is just minutes from dynamic downtown, yet provides an atmosphere of sequestered serenity. With elegant architecture inspired by West Indies Colonial design, The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne, Miami is one of the finest beach hotels Miami, Florida has to offer.Marriott

name: Casa Coral
description: Set in Miami, 0.8 mi from Miracle Mile Miami, Casa Coral offers air-conditioned rooms and a garden. Around 2.6 mi from Marlins Park, the property is also 2.6 mi away from Cocowalk Shopping Center and offers free WiFi. Bayside Market Place is 4.3 mi from the guest house and American Airlines Arena is 4.3 mi away. Guest rooms in the guest house are equipped with a flat-screen TV. The units feature a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. Casa Coral offers a terrace. University of Miami is 3.1 mi from the accommodations, while Vizcaya Museum is 3.1 mi away. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 2.5 mi from Casa Coral.
